comments:
i20030820

When trying to inspect a variable appearing in the Variables view (select
variable, open context menu, select Inspect), if the Expressions view has not
been opened yet, a "Internal Error" dialog will appear, then a "Unable to create
part: Expressions" dialog will follow. The log file will then contain the
following entries:
